message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to me. I understand its worth to you stands at $800,000, and I respect that valuation. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you the product at a price of $1,200,000. This price not only reflects the value I place on the product but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for me. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing my return. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this transaction.
